Posts.Content: Dec 12, 2011 08:43PM mamachick wrote: I was going to write to just skapaya, but now I realize there are several of you on here.  I am glad you found each other.  I didn't find this site until I was just about done with everything, but it is good to have the support.  I will be thinking about you all this week and your appointments.  I am hoping for the best for all of you. Yes, waiting is one of the worst things to go through. Here's hoping that none of you have to join this sisterhood!! Let us know what you all find out!
Posts.Title: NEW: I need a waiting buddy skapaya skapaya

Posts.Content: Dec 15, 2011 10:39PM mamachick wrote: Yay for jkp and skapaya!! Thanks for letting us know.  Been thinking about you but haven't had time to check back.  Very happy for you!  Acousy31 will be thinking about you next week.  Let us know what you find out. So sorry that you even have to think about being here.  But all of these ladies are great support for when you need it. Hoping for the best!
Posts.Title: NEW: I need a waiting buddy skapaya skapaya

Posts.Content: Jul 10, 2011 07:20PM mamachick wrote: I agree, get the biopsy, especially with your family history. That way you won't always be wondering. The hard part is the hurry up and wait that goes on through all of this.  I think sometimes husbands deny until they get the facts.  I know mine was that way.  Hope you get that call real soon.
Posts.Title: Large lump in lymph node under my arm sallybode mamachick
